subject: College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: After being burned by Gene Chizik, Iowa State has turned to an Iowan and a former Cyclones assistant, Paul Rhoads, to revive a program that went 2-10 this year and did not win a Big 12 Conference game.
snippet: After being burned by Gene Chizik, Iowa State has turned to an Iowan and a former Cyclones assistant, Paul Rhoads, to revive a program that went 2-10 this year and did not win a Big 12 Conference game.
